fees_page.title: Platform Tiers & Fees
fees_page.intro: Our system is designed to reward engagement and long-term participation through tiers, XP, and a dynamic fee structure.
fees_page.tiers_subtitle: Your account tier is determined by your total XP. The higher your tier the more pins you can equip, which can reduce costs and increase your daily XP bonus.
fees_page.fees_subtitle: Strategies become discounted with pins. Fees are used for platform operations, liquidity provision, and future development.
fees_page.core_vault_desc_1: Deposit Fee: 20% (Tier-Reduced). The deposit fee amount is credited to your Bonus Points balance.
fees_page.core_vault_desc_2: Performance Fee: Flat 20%, charged only on profits generated with a high-water mark.
fees_page.core_vault_desc_3: Lock-up Period: 1 month for any newly deposited capital.
fees_page.ape_vault_desc_1: Deposit Fee: Flat 20%. The deposit fee amount is credited to your Bonus Points balance.
fees_page.swarm_strategy_desc_1: Deposit Fee: 20% (Tier-Reduced). The deposit fee amount is credited to your Bonus Points balance.
fees_page.swarm_strategy_desc_2: Performance Fee: Flat 20%, charged only on profits generated with a high-water mark.
fees_page.swarm_strategy_desc_3: Lock-up Period: 1 month for any newly deposited capital.
fees_page.xp_subtitle: XP is the measure of your contribution to the ecosystem. See your rank on the <1>XP Leaderboard</1>.
fees_page.xp_rule_1_desc: Earn 1 XP for every $10 of capital you allocate to a strategy.
fees_page.xp_rule_2_desc: Unlock a 2% daily XP bonus on your strategy deposits.
fees_page.xp_rule_3_desc: Earn bonus XP EVERY time a user you referred allocates capital.
fees_page.xp_rule_4_desc: Earn 1 XP for every 10 bonus points the platform buys back from you or when you make discounted purchases in the Shop with your bonus points.

xp_leaderboard.title: XP Leaderboard
xp_leaderboard.subtitle: Earn XP by participating in the Hyper-Strategies ecosystem
xp_leaderboard.accordion_desc_signup: A one-time XP bonus is awarded to the first 500 users upon registration to reward our earliest supporters. The bonus is tiered:
xp_leaderboard.accordion_desc_allocation: You earn XP by putting your capital to work. For every $10 you allocate to a strategy (minimum $100 allocation), you receive 1 XP. A $1,000 allocation will net you 100 XP.
xp_leaderboard.accordion_desc_referral: When a user signs up with your referral code and makes a strategy allocation (minimum $100), you (the referrer) will receive XP equal to 5% of the allocation amount, EVERY TIME. If they allocate $1,000, you get 50 XP.
xp_leaderboard.accordion_desc_staking: We reward long-term commitment with a 2% daily XP bonus on strategy deposits.
xp_leaderboard.accordion_desc_buyback: When the platform buys back your bonus points, you will receive XP equal to 10% of the value. The same applies to the discounted purchases at the Shop.

add_to_home_screen.title: Install Hyper-Strategies App
add_to_home_screen.subtitle: For the best experience, add our app to your home screen.
add_to_home_screen.step1: 1. Tap the Share icon at the bottom.
add_to_home_screen.step2: 2. Scroll down and tap 'Add to Home Screen'.

legal.title: Legal Notice & Imprint
legal.disclaimer1: The information provided on this website does not constitute investment advice, financial advice, trading advice, or any other sort of advice and you should not treat any of the website's content as such. HyperStrategies does not recommend that any cryptocurrency should be bought, sold, or held by you.
legal.disclaimer2: Do conduct your own due diligence and consult your financial advisor before making any investment decisions. By purchasing or interacting with our services, you agree that you are not purchasing a security or investment and you agree to hold the team harmless and not liable for any losses or taxes you may incur.
legal.disclaimer3: Trading and investing in digital assets is highly speculative and comes with many risks. The analysis / stats on the website are for informational purposes and should not be treated as investment advice.
legal.rights: All rights reserved. The content and works published on this website are governed by the copyright laws of the operating jurisdiction.

journey.step_one_copy: Register in under a minute to get access to Hyper-Strategies and make a deposit.
journey.step_two_title: Configure your profile and pin loadout
journey.step_two_copy: Complete your profile and equip any available pins to benefit from their perks.
journey.step_three_copy: Pick between different automated strategies that match your risk appetite. Set and forget.

faq_page.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq_page.q1_answer: When depositing in our strategies, 20% of your deposit is credited to you as bonus points. We will periodically buy back these points for USDC (1:1), which will be added to your “Available to Allocate” balance for immediate withdrawal or reinvestment. Bonus Points may also be used in the Shop for significant discounts.
faq_page.q2_answer: A high water mark ensures that the performance fee is only applied to **new profits**, not on funds that are simply recovering from a previous loss.
faq_page.q3_title: How are withdrawals from strategies handled?
faq_page.q3_answer: When you request a withdrawal from a strategy, a request is created to move your 'Tradable Capital' back to your main 'Available to Allocate' balance. This process can take up to 24 hours to complete. To withdraw funds from the platform to an external wallet, you must use the 'Withdraw Funds' feature on the Wallet page after your strategy withdrawal has been processed. That process should only take minutes.

profile_page.modern_subtitle: Complete the steps below to unlock the full ecosystem — from personalised referrals to collectible pins and seasonal rewards.
profile_page.journey_title: Here are 3 more tips to get the most out of your account
profile_page.journey_step_one_copy: You can personalize your username and referral link. Your referral link is your Hyper-Strategies identity. Usernames will not be made public for your own privacy.

profile_page.journey_step_three_copy: Claim XP for various activites, level up your tier to equip more pins to benefit from more perks and unlock access to the token presale.

0.headline: Let your capital move intelligently.
0.body: Deposit once. Hyper Strategies automatically routes capital between strategies and safety mechanisms.

1.headline: The money flow.
1.body: 80% to active strategies. 20% to Safety Fund, Farming, and Token Seeding.

3.headline: Inside a strategy.
3.body: Signals → positions → risk controls → rebalance → realize PnL → compound.

4.headline: Security & protection.
4.body: Safety Fund, selective Farming, and Token Seeding for alignment.

5.headline: Fees & high-watermark.
5.body: 20% performance fee only on profits above your high-watermark.

6.headline: Rewards, XP & tiers.
6.body: Earn through Rewards Center, level up with XP, and climb tiers.

7.headline: Reporting & syndicates.
7.body: Personal and public reports, plus community syndicates.

tooltips.hwm: Fees only on new profits above your highest equity peak.
